He takes care of me so much, I used to provide him with bad shots cause I was upset with my previous master. But, he printed with a little editing and put them in his studio, it made me so appalled that he would display that. So, I decided that if he was going to display any of my work it would be good work. I know I'm a camera and I can't really be talking you, right? Camm then sighed as he was relieved he caught Lilian in time. Camm then got up as he then said with a coldness, "I'll be leaving and not coming back. This may have been my dream job for the next five years, I would have compromised my dignity, my college classes and expectations. But, not my camera, you tease about it once I over look it, twice and I'm letting slide. Three and I won't talk to you, but if you risk it's life then I won't associate myself with you. That is my way, that is my code of conduct. I won't be coming back, I quit. Oh, and since it was an offical job, I'll be expecting my first and only check." The lady then did a regal laugh as she then said, "You took pictures with a camera that wasn't one of ours, you're fired. So, (serious) get off the grounds or I'll call the police."

Lilian then said, "Oh, yeah? Alright, just for that, I'm going to do the best feat of all. Keep your image!" Camm raised his eye brows as he then blinked and shook his head, "That can't be right, there's no way that the camera typed." Camm walked in and grabbed a compatible card, he then went up to the register. The man then said, "That'll be 10 dollars." Camm took out the amount and gave it to the man. He then walked out and put the card in, the display screen then showed all the pics at the studio. Camm's eyes widen as he then said, "Lilian how did you do that? Huh, I got to get home before I get caught."

Camm walked into his apartment as he then loaded up the memory card reader and plugged it in. Camm then said, "Those two women were terrible, but with some keen editing from your's truly. I can use them for my portfolio." Camm then looked at Lilian then said, "You know, you've always been a great girl to me and I've done portraits to all the people that mean much to me. But, I can't take a picture of my only camera with my camera, and I can't go get another one. That'd be like betraying you, so I'm going to edit these pictures the absolute best. I'm going to make this my best work ever and name it Lilian."

Camm opened up photoshop as he then said, "Alright, time to get to work. Cut out the concubine's face and put it on the bitch of a boss's body. Auto contrast, liquidize the body to make her look younger. Etherealness it by seven percent and cloning out the age marks bitch. Camm then said, "And now for the final touch, so that no one else in the world be like my Lilian. Blue eyes with a half tint of purple at the bottom of the iris. Finished, save as Lilian."

Camm then said, "I hope you are happy Lilian, good night Lilian. All I have ever needed was you." Camm pulled out the futon and laid down inside it. He then went to sleep as Lilian then said, "Oh, master I want to be beside you forever and just like you said all I need is you. Oh, god please let me be real, so that I can hold him close and never let him go. Please." A glow came from the computer screen as a white light came out of it and then the alarm went off. Camm then was about to get the alarm when he heard a female voice say, "No, I'll get it master." Camm then said, "Thanks, who ever you are." The voice then giggled happily, "Oh, master, it's me Lilian." Camm then said, "Oh, that's cool Lilian." Camm then snapped up as he said, "Aah, Lilian!" Lilian from the computer screen was sitting straddled on his lap with a smile as she was beaming him with her big eyes, "Good morning master."

info.brief_description: Camm or an OC you design has discovered that he can create girls with his camera!
info.description:
This story is either a fanfiction or an original. Say that you aren't into OCs, then do a fanfiction character. So, the main character gets a camera that takes pics of girls in their universe. And then the character edits the girls on photoshop and names them. After he does so the creations come to life to please their creator. If you have creative issues with creating girls you can go to HERE ▼
http://www.seventhsanctum.com/generate.php?Genname=generalperson
or you can just use girls from anime and cartoons to be the girls.

In the original route Camm will be the OC and his route can be either second pov or third pov. Other beginning routes will be blank for other OCs or other characters in established anime and cartoon universes. Also, you can do crossovers where example Issei takes pics of girls and edits them, then out from his camera or computer or just out of no where comes Miyako Shiina.
